featured.text: But this story written 40 years ago __(27)__ predicted the arrival of a recent method of genetic engineering—cloning.
Cloning is the genetic process of producing copies of an individual.

definition.zh_def: 克隆：通過無性繁殖或其他技術，創造出與原始生物基因相同的生物。
definition.en_def: Cloning: The process of creating a genetically identical copy of an organism through asexual reproduction or other techniques.
definition.example: Scientists are researching cloning to potentially save endangered species.
